summary: A set of black themed light armour clothing for males.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35889-1-1368263711.jpg[/img]

A set of black themed light armour clothing males ONLY. All races.
A torso, gloves and boots. Recoloured from vanilla assets these are fully craftable and do not replace anything.

The materiel costs are..
Torso/pants = 2 leather strips, 3 leather.
Gloves = 1 leather strip and 1 leather.
Boots = 1 leather strip and 2 leather.

It isnt pure black, so if you stand in a strong outdoor lighting area you should see some slight colour in the material. 
Also unfortunately there is some clipping for sheathed 2handers. This is the fault of the Bethesda made mesh.

As mentioned, this is for MALE characters only. You can technically craft it as a female, however it will just produce the standard texture for the female version of the meshes.

Compatibility: Unless there is a mod  with the texture folder and .esp called ClothesBlack, there should not be any problems.
author: Makk128
